Description: Painted sycomore fig wood daily life shabti of Wennekhu(?), a priest of Khons, with a black lappet wig, a brown face, a white body and legs, the brown hands are depicted holding two red hoes enclosed by the green and red collar, the figure is shown wearing a kilt with a triangular apron inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground, the back has a yellow seed-basket.
